result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Central, Wyndham St, 33號7th FloorLKF Tower
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Central, Wyndham St, 33號7th FloorLKF Tower
result.name: Buenos Aires Polo Club

reviews.text: Came for weekend brunch for a birthday celebration.  What a great place.  While there weren't that many dishes on offer at the buffet, the quality was very good. And the star of the show is the aged Argentinian prime rib anyways so you want to save your space for that! Cooked perfectly medium rare, tender and juicy.  Make sure you ask for a bone to gnaw on.  Desserts were very tasty as well. Best part though is the service.  The staff were friendly without being overbearing and they helped create a lively vibe.

Reading the other reviews we must have come on an off night.  Service was friendly but very busy and easily distracted. The steak was disappointing, too much gristle and too chewy. Sides were ok. The music was crazy loud and I know a few tables complained.  Apparently Thursday is loud music night so don’t expect conversation at the table on a Thursday. The waiter was almost impossible to hear, which resulted in us not getting what we thought we ordered.  They did offer to replace once we explained, which was nice, although we declined.  The manager was friendly, the complimentary drinks were a nice touch. We will probably try again and hope for a better piece of meat.
Great service, cool decor and excellent food. Very nice.
Great oysters for the brunch option.  Worth the money!!
Great atmosphere, friendly & attentive service and delicious food. I enjoyed the cocktails, the blood sausage and empanadas together with a bone-in steak. Must try!

reviews.text: Came for weekend brunch for a birthday celebration.  What a great place.  While there weren't that many dishes on offer at the buffet, the quality was very good. And the star of the show is the aged Argentinian prime rib anyways so you want to save your space for that! Cooked perfectly medium rare, tender and juicy.  Make sure you ask for a bone to gnaw on. Reading the other reviews we must have come on an off night.  Service was friendly but very busy and easily distracted. The steak was disappointing, too much gristle and too chewy. Sides were ok. The music was crazy loud and I know a few tables complained.  Apparently Thursday is loud music night so don’t expect conversation at the table on a Thursday. The waiter was almost impossible to hear, which resulted in us not getting what we thought we ordered.  They did offer to replace once we explained, which was nice, although we declined.  The manager was friendly, the complimentary drinks were a nice touch. We will probably try again and hope for a better piece of meat.

約咗位唔想食澱粉質既減肥美女食LUNCH, 係中環苦海入面, 腦海閃過無數餐廳🧠最後諗起呢間優質牛扒餐廳🐂Buenos Aires Polo Club; 位處係老蘭既頂端, 由中環行上去已經係減肥既開始, 乘搭電梯黎到七樓, 一打開門已經係掛住馬球棍同裝備🐎充滿殖民地色彩🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿🇭🇰
 
一坐低, 典型既西式餐廳問你乜水🥛雖然香港係唔飲水喉水, 但我都跟足叫TAP WATER; 餐廳以馬球做主題🏇🏇綠色同木色既主調加添幾分會所貴氣, 餐枱同櫈都係走簡樸既米色同木色無多餘既點綴; 櫃入面仲有唔少獎盃珍藏, 坐位唔少, 估計50人以上; 但12點黎到一半都唔滿, 可能位處較高同價錢唔平, 大家唔多願爬上黎👨‍🦳
 
中午MENU, 又係Set 同A la carte😎set lunch 統一main dish 都係牛; 分別係Sirloin (西冷, 牛外脊)、Ribeye´(肉眼 )、Tenderloin (裡脊肉); 頭盤有洋葱湯、牛饀餅、沙律; 然後伴碟再有薯條、西蘭花、焗薯揀; 好典型既英式食扒法🎩
 
洋葱湯上枱係浸住兩大塊發水麵包🍞下低責任住好多洋葱; 傳統既湯無加其他醬料, 只係單純咁發揮洋葱小酸甜既味, 比較接近輕身羅宋湯既味道。不過兩大塊麵包落肚, 已經佔左唔少空間😰
 
朋友既沙律, 幾乎將個小型包心菜🥬整棵開邊上台, 仲伴埋兩大块煙肉, 望而生畏, 食晒都唔駛食正餐😵
 
開動完頭盤, 黎到餐廳特色環節; 揀武器🤺服務員拿住一盤刀具比你揀, 用邊一把絕世好劍定係雪飲刀 (又出賣自己年齡) 去同隻牛行刑, 揀咗一把較優雅簡樸既白色小刀🗡柄上有一隻蟬 (定烏蠅🦟
 
兩個都點咗RIBEYE, 我叫既係MEDIUM; 黑麻麻一舊上枱, 同英式食物又係一致, 唔講賣相; 仲要搭咗1/4楷洋葱; 另外有跟咗特別醬汁: 係蒽加蒜頭同辣椒, 服務員已特別聲明係只係小小辣
 
切開肉眼, 見到完美粉紅, 同英國人一樣🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿內斂不外求; 好既嘢都係包藏係中心; 咬落去JUICY度十足, 燒得焦黑既表面係為咗要保留核心既肉汁; 點上外貌不討好既特別醬汁, 更加將牛既油膩平衡番, 更易入口🥰
 
Side dish 既薯條份量又係超多🍟🍟無放上碟度, 令佢保持香脆, 就好似加脆版老麥薯條咁, 加埋少少葱花, 更加香口😻
 
完成大大餐後, 多加杯咖啡☕️配埋兩舊充滿牛油既曲奇🍪其實呢餐係增肥定減肥呢😝
 
埋單唔平, 每人都300-400; 係中環黎講都係高級價, 但服務, 裝修, 食物對得起呢個價有餘🤑
Great service, cool decor and excellent food. Very nice.
Great oysters for the brunch option.  Worth the money!!
